```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
bidenvector <- (list.files(path = "biden_speeches"))[1:167]
```

```{r}
all_biden <- data.frame()
for(i in 1:167){
  Biden_i <- read_tsv(paste0("biden_speeches/", bidenvector[i]), col_names = FALSE)
  all_biden <- bind_rows(all_biden, Biden_i)
}
```

```{r}
trumpvector <- (list.files(path = "trump_speeches"))
```

```{r}
all_trump <- data.frame()
for(j in 1:119){
  Trump_j <- read_tsv(paste0("trump_speeches/", trumpvector[j]), col_names = FALSE)
  all_trump <- bind_rows(all_trump, Trump_j)
}
```
